user.title: Elica Getup
user.description:
Enter your credentials as in the Elica Connect app, configured in cloud mode.

**DISCLAIMER**: This is an unofficial integration. Use at your own risk. By proceeding, you acknowledge and accept all risks associated with using this integration.

data_description.username: Your email address used in the Elica Connect app
data_description.password: Your password for the Elica Connect app
data_description.app_uuid: A unique identifier for your device (e.g., af3c7b5d2f17b6da). You can customize this as you like.
data_description.device_name: Custom name for your device (default: Elica Getup)

error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication credentials. Please check your Elica Connect username and password.
